DOC.brief_summary: In pilot study investigator aim investigate effect vitamin D supplementation regulatory FoxP3+ T cell gastrointestinal mucosa healthy woman men .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Supplementation Regulatory FoxP3+ T Cells GUT
DOC.detailed_description: This monocentric , open pilot study , aim evaluate effect vitamin supplementation regulatory FoxP3+ T cell gastrointestinal mucosa healthy woman men . The primary goal evaluate influence vitamin D supplementation regulatory FoxP3+ T cell gastrointestinal mucosa control condition within 2 month . The secondary study goal evaluate effect vitamin D supplementation peripheral induce tregs important immune cell tissue ( NK , NKT cell LPCD ) blood ( NK , NKT cell , Th17 , Th1 , Th2 cell ) within 2 month .
DOC.criteria: 1840 year non smoker BMI : 2030 kg/mÂ² Healthy hypercalcemia > 2,65 mmol/L pregnancy chronic disease
